sect1.title: Cleanup
sect1.para:
Remove untracked files from the working tree.
TortoiseGit Cleanup
Cleans the working tree by recursively removing files that are not under version control, starting from the current directory or on the whole working tree (depends on version of installed git).
Clean dialog

caution.title: Attention
caution.para: This command affects the whole working tree and will delete all untracked files using the recycle bin (Since TortoiseGit v1.7.11)!
